titleStmt.title: Carmen gratulatorium, ad serenissimum, potentissimum, et invictissimum monarcham, Iacobum id nominis sextum, Magnæ Britanniæ, Franciæ, & Hiberniæ regem, fidei defensorem, &c. / Authore Samuele Kello, Scoto, Academiæ Edinburgensis Alumno.
titleStmt.author: Kello, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Some print show-through, and some leaves creased.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
